job_title: Call Center Executive Cum Facebook Moderator
job_description:
Responsibilities: ***Priority will be given to the residents of Moghbazar, Eskaton, and Banglamotor area*** * Receiving and managing inbound and outbound calls. * Providing information related to vehicle to customers and answering queries. * Making follow-up calls to interested customers. * Listening to customer complaints and providing solutions with patience. * Promptly replying to customer messages in the Facebook Page inbox. * Monitoring comments and replying or moderating as necessary. * Filtering out spam and inappropriate comments for removal/hiding. * Creating Facebook Engagement reports. * Understanding customer interests and demands to make proposals.

Requirements: * Must be from the area of Mogbazar or its surroundings.
* Must have at least 1 year of practical experience in call center and Facebook page moderation.
* Priority will be given to those with experience in Genex Infosys / Digicon Technology Ltd.
* Running students need not apply, must work in two shifts (mandatory).
* Must work in the office - not work from home.
* Must have a smart, polite, and humble demeanor, and avoid regionalism while speaking.
* Must have the mentality to speak with patience and interest with customers, giving importance to the customer's statements and providing solutions beautifully.
* Must be skilled in problem-solving.
* Will receive 1000 taka for snacks every month.
* Opportunity for good incentives outside of salary.
* 4 days off per month and opportunity for overtime.
* Working hours: 9 am to 7 pm, 12 pm to 10 pm.
* Educational qualification: Minimum HSC.
* Age: 22 to 27 years.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Are you hardworking? Do you want to eliminate unemployment? If so, an extraordinary opportunity awaits you! With over 155 years of experience, operating in more than 40 countries worldwide, and holding a prominent position in Bangladesh for over 70 years, American financial organization MetLife offers a golden opportunity to build a career as a Financial Associate. Responsibilities: Identifying new customers and establishing communication with them Creating appropriate insurance and savings plans based on the customer's income source, future plans, and needs Regularly following up with existing customers and ensuring their satisfaction Providing correct guidance on financial security and investment plans to customers Meeting monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets Conducting marketing activities to enhance brand value Building long-term relationships with customers and providing financial solutions to their families Participating actively in company training, workshops, and developmental programs

Requirements: Minimum Bachelor's Degree (in any subject) Preference will be given to candidates with a background in Business, Management, or Marketing Experience in Sales/Marketing/Finance sector will be preferred Freshers can also apply Age 25 years or above Must have excellent communication skills and presentation abilities Must have a mindset for goal-oriented work Must be self-confident, hardworking, and capable of accepting challenges Benefits:- Attractive salary (twice a month) тЬЕ Minimum 3 bonuses per year тЬЕ Provident Fund тЬЕ Medical facilities тЬЕ Pension benefits тЬЕ International educational trips annually тЬЕ Local trips тЬЕ Award nights with life partners тЬЕ Annual forest retreat with family тЬЕ Company insurance coverage тЬЕ Fast career progression based on performance (Opportunity to become Unit Manager and later Branch Manager) тЬЕ Opportunity to run your own agency тЬЕ Work autonomy based on your convenient time If you are ready to take on challenges and want to advance in a successful career path, then join our team today! Apply today!

job_description:
Responsibilities: Identify and communicate with potential B2B clients including food manufacturers, confectionery companies, and bakeries Promote Raw Materials and Ingredients based on client requirements Prepare and deliver effective Sales Pitch and Product Presentation Build long-term relationships with industrial clients and distributors Ensure customer satisfaction by providing pre-sales and post-sales support Analyze market trends, pricing, and competitor products Propose pricing and product strategies based on market demand Coordinate with Supply Chain and Logistics teams to ensure timely delivery Follow up on orders, payments, and necessary documentation Assist in creating Marketing Materials for the Food Processing and Manufacturing industry Regularly update client data, quotations, and sales pipeline Prepare monthly Sales Reports and Market Feedback Represent the company at Food Ingredient Expo, B2B Trade Fairs, and Networking Events Achieve monthly and quarterly Sales Targets

Requirements: Minimum 1 year sales experience (preferably in the Raw Materials / Ingredients sector) Minimum Bachelor's Degree in any subject Excellent communication skills, negotiation, and relationship management skills Ability to work independently and a mindset for achieving targets Capability to work in a B2B sales environment

job_description:
Responsibilities: About the Organization Chhaya Technologies Limited is a pioneering technology-based organization working to ensure easily accessible and affordable digital healthcare services for the general population of Bangladesh. Through innovative Chhaya Digital Health Packages , healthcare services are being made easily accessible in various regions of the country. The organization is working with a skilled sales team consisting of young, entrepreneurial, and hardworking individuals. Position Field Sales Officer Workplace Field: Any area in the Dhaka division Minimum Educational Qualification SSC or equivalent Experience 6 months - 1 year (Freshers can also apply) Job Type Full-time (Day shift) Working Hours: 8 hours per day Salary and Benefits Basic Salary: BDT 10,500 (fixed) TA/DA: BDT 2,600 (at a rate of BDT 100 per day) Sales Commission: BDT 5,000 - 20,000 Additional Benefits: Attractive promotions, star bonuses, and monthly top performer rewards Other Benefits: Annual salary increment 2 festival bonuses per year Responsibilities Work in densely populated areas such as metro rail platforms, major markets, bus stands, fairs, railway stations, and shopping malls. Directly engage with customers to sell Chhaya Digital Health Packages . Achieve daily sales targets. Collect information from interested customers and register them through the app. Provide daily sales and activity reports. Qualifications Minimum SSC/HSC pass. Must be proficient in using smartphones. Must be enthusiastic and patient in direct sales work. Good communication skills and self-confidence are required. Must have a mindset to work in an outdoor environment. Experience Freshers can also apply. Preference will be given to experienced candidates in sales, customer service, field sales, marketing, or insurance. Contact Head Office & Interview Location: House No. 1230 (Flat 3-B), Road No. 12, Avenue 9, Mirpur DOHS, Dhaka-1216 Contact: 01339774755

job_title: Recruitment Field Executive тАУ Manpower Sourcing (Overseas Jobs)
company_address: Baridhara DOHS, House 486 Road No. 8, Dhaka 1212
job_description:
Responsibilities: Shomvob is hiring a Recruitment Field Executive to support large-scale overseas manpower sourcing through field recruitment camps, agent coordination, and community-based sourcing. This role requires regular field visits, direct candidate interaction, and close collaboration with local agents and community leaders.

Key Responsibilities:
- Organize and run recruitment camps in different districts and upazilas.
- Coordinate with Training Institutes, local agents, sub-agents, and community leaders.
- Source blue-collar candidates for overseas jobs (construction, factory, cleaning, driving, hospitality, etc.).
- Conduct initial screening of candidates (age, experience, skills, documents).
- Explain overseas job details clearly (country, salary, benefits, costs, process).
- Collect and verify candidate documents (passport, photos, certificates, videos).
- Ensure candidates are properly registered in Shomvob recruitment system.
- Follow up with candidates for interviews, trade tests, medical, and documentation.
- Maintain daily field activity reports and candidate sourcing updates.
- Ensure ethical recruitment practices and transparent communication with candidates.
- Support deployment coordination until visa issuance.

Required Qualifications & Skills:
- Minimum HSC/Bachelor's degree (Bachelor preferred).
- 1-3 years of experience in field recruitment, manpower sourcing, NGO field work, or sales/marketing preferred.
- Strong communication skills in Bangla and English.
- Willingness to travel extensively across districts.
- Experience working with agent networks or community sourcing is a strong advantage.
- Basic smartphone and data entry skills (Google Forms, WhatsApp, Excel).
- Honest, energetic, and people-friendly personality.

Job Type & Location:
- Employment Type: Full-time.
- Location: Field-based (Bangladesh-wide).
- Department: Shomvob Global.

Why Join Shomvob:
- Direct involvement in safe and ethical overseas employment.
- Opportunity to work at the grassroots level with real impact.
- Exposure to international manpower projects.
- Performance-based growth opportunities.

Analytics & Reporting: Tracking, analyzing, and reporting on digital performance using tools like Google Analytics. Trend Awareness: Staying updated with digital trends and AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Canva) to enhance efficiency.

Requirements: Experience: 3-5 years in digital marketing, preferably in an agency. Education: Bachelor's degree, often in Marketing or a related field. Skills: Proficiency in Google Analytics, SEO/SEM, Meta Business Suite, and excellent written/verbal English communication.

Responsibilities: - Greet and assist customers, address inquiries and concerns, and create a positive shopping experience.
- Receive incoming merchandise, verify quality and expiration dates, update pricing and promotional labels, and create visually appealing product displays.
- Replenish shelves, rotate stock effectively, identify and report overstock for markdowns, and minimize waste.
- Operate the point-of-sale (POS) system, process transactions (including billing, cash handling, voids, and returns), and adhere to standard operating procedures.
- Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas.
- Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations.
- Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Requirements: For any inquiries, please contact 01313054764 or 01999081181.

Operate the point-of-sale (POS) system, process transactions (including billing, cash handling, voids, and returns), and adhere to standard operating procedures. Maintain a clean and hygienic personal workspace, assigned section, and overall store environment, including equipment and display areas. Contribute to a collaborative team environment by working flexibly across different sections, actively participating in training programs, and supporting colleagues to ensure seamless operations. Promote special offers and gather customer feedback to help achieve outlet sales targets.

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of the job:
* Must be proficient in using a smartphone. Our work needs to be done through smartphones.

* Candidates who are entrepreneurial, hardworking, and willing to take on challenges are preferred. Being transparent in dealing with clients, managing, and explaining are important qualities.

Educational qualifications are essential for skilled candidates.

Responsibilities: - Prospect and acquire qualified students interested in studying abroad and guide them to suitable educational institutions based on their needs.
- Conduct daily outbound sales and account management activities including calls, emails, CRM updates, and virtual meetings.
- Generate appointments through proactive outbound prospecting.
- Increase brand presence, lead generation, and customer acquisition in targeted markets aligned with company goals.
- Manage a portfolio of student accounts to ensure long-term success and maintain strong client relationships.
- Ensure high levels of customer interaction, conversion, and lead generation.
- Develop and implement promotional strategies to promote Connected Education services.
- Prepare and submit regular reports on account status and transactions.
- Communicate with higher education institutions on behalf of students.
- Generate new business opportunities through existing and potential customer networks.
- Collaborate with Management and Marketing teams to improve sales performance and identify growth opportunities.
- Perform additional tasks and projects as assigned by management.

Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in any discipline
- 2-3 years of relevant experience in sales/business development
- Experience in education consultancy or study abroad services will be an advantage

Responsibilities: Job Summary:
The HR Manager is responsible for planning, developing, and managing human resource functions to support organizational goals. This role ensures effective recruitment, employee relations, performance management, compliance, and HR policy implementation.

Key Responsibilities:
* Develop and implement HR policies, procedures, and systems
* Manage end-to-end recruitment and selection process
* Handle employee onboarding, confirmation, and exit procedures
* Maintain employee records, attendance, leave, and HR documentation
* Oversee performance appraisal and employee development programs
* Ensure compliance with labor laws and company regulations
* Coordinate payroll, benefits, and compensation activities
* Address employee grievances and maintain healthy workplace relations
* Conduct disciplinary actions and internal investigations
* Plan and organize training and development programs
* Advise management on HR strategies and workforce planning

Required Qualifications:
* MBA in HR management.

Requirements: Experience:
* Minimum 3-5 years of experience in HR functions
* Previous experience as an HR Manager or Senior HR Executive preferred
Skills & Competencies:
* Strong knowledge of labor laws and HR practices
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Leadership and conflict resolution abilities
* Strong organizational and time management skills
* Proficiency in MS Office and HR software
* High level of confidentiality and professionalism
Working Conditions:
* Full-time office-based position
* Requires coordination with all departments
Salary Range:
30,000-50,000 
2 festival bonuses 
And other facilities according to company rule

Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputed multinational ITES company operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates willing to work at night shift. Males are encouraged to apply for the same position. FCBL has an amazing workplace at the heart of the town, Banani, for male staff.

Job Responsibilities
- Executing daily voice operations and successfully generating high-quality warm leads across multiple outbound telemarketing campaigns.
- Improving and operating specialized North American real estate management initiatives, primarily focusing on initial portfolio onboarding and management.
- Reviewing daily performance reports to identify discrepancies, revenue leakages, and operational errors for formal presentation to the higher management.
- Liaising with probationary personnel to identify performance obstacles and facilitate seamless cultural integration during the initial onboarding phase.
- Identifying interpersonal or departmental conflicts, developing comprehensive resolution frameworks, and preparing strategic recommendations.
- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop, pilot, and refine strategic engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Performing internal audits to mitigate opportunity loss, bridge communication voids, and uphold superior standards for internal and external stakeholder collaboration.

Employment Status
Full-time

Job Location
Dhaka

Compensation & Other Benefits
- On-time salary
- Monthly recreation based on performance
- Yearly recreation based on performance
- Unlimited NESCAF├Й
- Yearly 10 paid holidays
- Yearly 15 casual paid leaves
- All employees get loan facilities, including probationary employees
- Employees, their parents, spouses & children get a 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital
- Company sponsored 3 Annual programs

Read Before Apply
Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction on yourself (you can speak about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies & etc). The recording of your introduction must be in English. Save the audio file. You can use any other audio recording software too.

Send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with an attachment of your resume and the audio recording. Keep in mind the voice recording is to verify you are fluent in speaking English, so give your best try in that audio.

Responsibilities: The Business Development Executive (B2B & Corporate Sales) will be responsible for acquiring new corporate and B2B clients, managing existing client relationships, and driving revenue growth by promoting Steadfast Courier's courier and logistics services.

Key Responsibilities:

- Identify, generate, and onboard new B2B and corporate clients
- Conduct client meetings, presentations, and business negotiations
- Promote courier and logistics solutions including domestic, e-commerce, and bulk delivery services
- Prepare customized proposals, rate sheets, and service agreements based on client requirements
- Maintain strong relationships with existing corporate clients to ensure business retention and growth
- Achieve monthly and quarterly sales targets and prepare regular sales reports
- Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and identify new business opportunities
- Coordinate with operations and customer support teams to ensure smooth service delivery

Requirements: BachelorтАЩs degree in any discipline (Business background preferred)
Minimum 1 year of experience in B2B or Corporate Sales (Courier or Logistics experience is an advantage)
Strong communication and negotiation skills in English and Bangla
Basic proficiency in MS Excel, email communication, and reporting
Willingness to conduct fieldwork and attend client meetings
Skills & Competencies
Target-driven and results-oriented mindset
Strong relationship management and follow-up skills
Effective negotiation and problem-solving abilities
Good time management and self-motivation

job_description:
Responsibilities: Butterfly Group, a trusted leader in Bangladesh's electronics and home appliance industry, proudly represents global brands like LG, Haier, and Eco+. We're expanding our footprint in the HVAC sector with innovative cooling solutions including VRF/VRV systems, chillers, and ducted units. We're seeking a dynamic and target-driven Sales Engineer (HVAC-Sales) to join our team and drive growth through technical expertise and strong client relationships.

- Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.

- Present and promote HVAC products and solutions to clients and decision-makers.
- Prepare quotations, proposals, and tender submissions and follow up for closure.
- Interpret HVAC drawings, BOQs, and specifications to propose effective technical solutions.

- Track and report on sales performance, pipeline progress, and market trends.

ЁЯФ╣ Technical Skills
- In-depth knowledge of HVAC systems (Chillers, AHUs, VRF/VRV, Ducting, etc.)
- Familiarity with design software such as AutoCAD, HAP, etc. (preferred)
- Ability to read and interpret HVAC drawings and project specifications

ЁЯФ╣ Qualifications & Experience
- B.Sc. in Mechanical/Electrical Engineering from any reputed public/private university
- Minimum 2 years of experience in HVAC project or solution sales
- Candidates with an MBA in Marketing will get preference

ЁЯФ╣ Why Join Us
- Competitive salary (based on experience)
- Work hours: 8:30 AM тАУ 4:45 PM
- Fridays off + 2 Saturdays off per month
- 3 annual bonuses
- Subsidized lunch & transport facilities
- Comprehensive employee insurance
- Great learning and growth opportunities

Shifts from 7 am, 9 am, and 10:45 am. 12-hour duty. 1-hour break time Delivery Bonus: A bonus of 10 Taka is given for each delivery from 18 to 24 deliveries. After 24 deliveries, a bonus of 15 Taka is given for all deliveries. Incentive arrangements are available Other benefits: Six-monthly salary increment. Twice a year festival allowance. 14 days sick leave per year after six months. 11 days festival leave per year after six months. 12 days annual leave per year after six months. 10 days casual leave per year after six months

Requirements: Terms and Conditions: The individual must be 18 years old or above as per birth registration or national ID card.

job_title: Production Assistant тАУ Premium Chocolate & Pastry Brand
job_description:
Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities

- Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance.
- Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes.
- Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery.
- Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment.
- Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use.

Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

Requirements: Safety & Compliance

- Strict Sanitation: Adhere to all personal hygiene protocols, including the mandatory use of hairnets, gloves, and aprons.
- Equipment Safety: Follow safety instructions carefully when operating machinery or handling sharp/hot equipment.
- Safe Handling: Practice safe ingredient storage and handling to prevent cross-contamination.
- Environmental Safety: Maintain a clutter-free workspace to prevent accidents and ensure a safe working environment for the whole team.

Candidate Profile

- Attitude: Honest, punctual, and highly disciplined.
- Education: Minimum SSC preferred.
- Experience: Previous kitchen, bakery, or packing experience is a plus, but freshers are highly encouraged to apply.
- Training: Full professional training will be provided.

What We Offer

- Competitive entry-level salary.
- Hands-on skill development in a premium work environment.
- Long-term career growth opportunities.

Key Responsibilities Production Support: Assist the production team in crafting high-quality chocolates and pastries under professional guidance. Batching & Preparation: Precisely measure, weigh, and organize ingredients for production batches according to established recipes. Packaging & Quality Control: Carefully pack finished products in premium packaging, ensuring they are aesthetically presented and ready for delivery. Workplace Hygiene: Maintain strict hygiene and cleanliness standards in the workspace to ensure a food-safe environment. Tool & Equipment Handling: Handle delicate kitchen tools and machinery with care, ensuring they are cleaned and stored properly after use. Operational Support: Support daily logistics and operational tasks to ensure a smooth production flow from start to finish.

company_address: HealthOS Ltd, Khan ABC Tradeplex, Road-02, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, 1205, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Key Responsibilities:
- Coordinate daily delivery schedules, routes, and assignments for delivery staff.
- Ensure timely and accurate delivery of products to clients.
- Monitor delivery progress and resolve issues such as delays, complaints, or misdeliveries.
- Maintain communication with warehouse & logistics.
- Track inventory and delivery records, ensuring proper documentation is maintained.
- Supervise and support delivery staff to maintain performance standards.
- Ensure compliance with company policies, safety rules, and operational guidelines.
- Generate daily delivery reports for management.

Qualifications & Skills:
- Bachelor's degree in any discipline.
- Minimum 1 year of experience in logistics, supply chain, or delivery coordination (Freshers are also encouraged to apply).
- Strong organizational and time management skills.
- Ability to handle multiple tasks and work under pressure.
- Good communication and leadership skills.
- Proficiency in MS Office.

Key Responsibilities: Coordinate daily delivery schedules, routes, and assignments for delivery staff. Ensure timely and accurate delivery of products to clients. Monitor delivery progress and resolve issues such as delays, complaints, or misdeliveries. Maintain communication with warehouse & logistics. Track inventory and delivery records, ensuring proper documentation is maintained. Supervise and support delivery staff to maintain performance standards. Ensure compliance with company policies, safety rules, and operational guidelines. Generate daily delivery reports for management. Qualifications & Skills: Bachelor degree in any discipline. Minimum 1 years of experience in logistics, supply chain, or delivery coordination (Freshers Are also encourage to apply) Strong organizational and time management skills. Ability to handle multiple tasks and work under pressure. Good communication and leadership skills. Proficiency in MS Office.

Responsibilities: Our company will hire several diligent delivery men to ensure that our company's cleaning products (dishwashers, toilet cleaners, etc.) are delivered to customers and retailers on time and with care. Dam finish / pipe and tank cleaner ЁЯФ╣ Main responsibilities: Product delivery: Receive products from the warehouse according to daily orders and deliver them to the correct destination (muddy shop, hardware store, or institution). Money collection: Collect the correct amount as per the invoice at the end of product delivery and report it to the office at the end of the day. Product safety: Take special care to ensure that liquid or cleaner products do not leak or get damaged during transportation. Van/bicycle operation: Operate the company-provided van for product delivery. Conduct: Maintain a courteous and professional conduct with customers and retailers.

company_address: House# 79, 6th Floor, New Airport Road,Banani,Chairman Bari, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: 1. Client Engagement (Relationship Building):
Understanding the needs and expectations related to visa processing of clients, creating and maintaining a good relationship with them.
Maintaining direct communication with clients and guiding them through the entire visa application process, providing solutions to any questions or issues.

2. Marketing Strategy Development:
Collaborating with the marketing team to create and implement effective marketing plans to attract new clients.
Analyzing market trends and competitors' activities to identify opportunities for improvement.

3. Service Promotion:
Creating attractive brochures, presentations, and social media content in simple language to explain the benefits of visa processing services.
Creating awareness among potential clients through promotional events, webinars, and workshops.

4. Analysis of Client Needs:
Understanding the needs of each client and customizing services accordingly to make them feel valued.
Providing detailed information about visa types, timelines, required documents, and potential challenges.

5. Time Management and Process Optimization:
Creating a specific timeline for each client's visa process and providing regular updates.
Collaborating with the internal team to streamline the entire process for ease and efficiency.

6. Feedback and Improvement:
Collecting and analyzing client feedback to determine areas for service improvement.
Implementing changes based on feedback to enhance client satisfaction and trust.

7. Reporting and Analytics:
Generating regular reports on marketing performance, client numbers, and satisfaction.
Verifying the success of marketing campaigns through data analysis and making decisions for future planning accordingly.

Requirements: Proficient communication skills (in both Bengali and English) Prior experience in visa processing or client service is advantageous Mentality to engage with clients in a professional and empathetic manner Interest and experience in marketing strategy and event management Proficiency in social media, presentation, and content creation Must be skilled in time management and multitasking A proactive and focused mindset in problem-solving Understanding of data analysis and reporting is required Interest in participating in and managing events, workshops, or webinars Commitment to long-term work and dedication to professional development

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for responsible, polite, and confident individuals to join our team as a Telemarketing and Telesales Executive. The responsibilities of this position include communicating with customers over the phone, providing information about products/services, and assisting in sales activities.

Responsibilities:
- Contacting potential and existing customers over the phone
- Presenting detailed information about products and services clearly and attractively
- Resolving customer inquiries and issues
- Following up with interested customers to complete sales
- Maintaining accurate records of calls and customer-related information
- Ensuring customer satisfaction through polite and professional behavior
- Coordinating with the team to achieve daily and monthly sales targets

Requirements: Qualifications and Experience Minimum Qualification: SSC Pass Preference will be given to candidates with experience in Telesales, Telemarketing, Product Sales, or Customer Support Ability to communicate clearly, effectively, and professionally Proficiency in computer skills (MS Word, MS Excel, Email, etc.) Mindset to work responsibly and diligently Fresh candidates are also encouraged to apply (training opportunities available for qualified candidates) Work Schedule Morning 10:00 AM - Evening 9:00 PM Lunch and prayer facilities available Workplace ЁЯУН House- 82/1, Road- 02, Block- A, Niketon, Gulshan- 1, Dhaka- 1212 What We Offer Friendly and supportive work environment Training and learning opportunities Opportunity for long-term work and career development

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities: - Lead Generation & Telemarketing: Making outbound calls to prospective clients daily to introduce company projects and services. Clearly communicating product details to generate interest.
- Appointment Scheduling: Convincing potential clients over the phone and fixing scheduled appointments or meetings for the sales team.
- VIP Client Management: Meeting VIP and Corporate clients at the office or project sites. You must present yourself as the face of the company with a well-groomed appearance.
- Sales & Negotiation: conducting presentations, negotiating prices, and closing sales deals to achieve monthly targets.
- Follow-up & Relationship Building: Maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential clients through regular follow-ups via phone, WhatsApp, and Email.
- Documentation & Reporting: Drafting professional emails, maintaining client databases in MS Excel, and submitting daily work reports to the management.
- Field Work: Willingness to visit project sites or client offices when necessary to facilitate sales.

Requirements: ```html Additional Requirements Age 22 to 28 years Communication Skills: Must have fluent communication skills in both Bangla & English with a clear and confident voice. Appearance: Must be smart, good-looking, and well-groomed/presentable (essential for interacting with high-profile clients). Attitude: Must be energetic, target-oriented, and hardworking. Flexibility: Must have the mentality to work extra hours occasionally outside of standard office time if required by the business or for urgent client meetings. Tech Skills: Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel), Email drafting, and WhatsApp communication is required. ```

Responsibilities: ```html Gate Control: Inspect every individual entering and exiting the warehouse. Do not allow unauthorized individuals inside. Document Check: Before any truck exits, make sure to verify the invoice (delivery note) and gate pass. Manual Counting / Tally: Count each package or carton manually while loading or unloading the truck. Weight Monitoring: Ensure to weigh each truck on the scale during entry and exit. Lock & Key: Securely lock all warehouse doors and shutters at the end of work and keep the key safe. Perimeter Patrol: Regularly patrol the perimeter fence and warehouse area to check for any suspicious activities. Fire Safety: Enforce a strict "No Smoking" policy inside the warehouse to prevent fire incidents. Labor Supervision: Supervise workers to ensure no goods are being hidden or stolen during busy loading times. Night Vigilance: Stay awake and alert during the night shift using torchlight and whistle. Reporting: Immediately inform the manager if any goods are lost, damaged, or if any issues occur. Benefits: Overtime ```

Responsibilities: Responsibilities:
- Welcome customers to the restaurant and assist them in a friendly manner.
- Maintain cleanliness and hygiene in the dining area including tables, chairs, and dining space.
- Keep the floor, counter, and customer service area clean and organized at all times.
- Assist in food presentation and packaging.
- Work as a kitchen helper when required.
- Help in food preparation and packaging.
- Ensure proper packaging of food items.
- Adhere to kitchen health and safety regulations and policies.
- Keep the kitchen and workstation clean at the end of the shift.
- Show interest in taking on any additional tasks assigned by the company.
- Participate in teamwork and support colleagues.

Qualifications:
- No prior experience required, training will be provided.
- Must be polite, responsible, and eager to learn.
- Must be mentally prepared to work on shifts, weekly offs, and public holidays.
- Must maintain a healthy and hardworking attitude.

Salary and Benefits:
- Salary: 11,000 BDT per month (monthly)
- Daily: 140 BDT (outside of salary)
- Free accommodation provided.
- 2 annual bonuses.
- 1 day off per week.
- Opportunity for a salary increase at the beginning of the year.
- Promotion opportunities.

Work Hours: 12 hours per day

To apply, send your CV via WhatsApp to 01896107730.

Responsibilities: Job Description

Job Title: Junior Sales Executive
Location: Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited
Job Type: Full-Time

Job Summary:
Green Tiger Electric Vehicle Limited is seeking a motivated and detail-oriented Junior Sales Executive to support sales growth, manage customer relationships, handle customer service activities, and ensure smooth order processing and payment coordination.

Key Responsibilities:
- Identify and acquire new customers through field visits, phone calls, and online platforms.
- Manage and follow up on online and offline leads to convert them into sales.
- Present and demonstrate product features, pricing, and benefits to customers.
- Maintain regular communication with existing customers and ensure repeat business.
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and service issues professionally and promptly.
- Process customer orders, prepare necessary documentation, and coordinate delivery schedules.
- Collect payments, confirm transactions, prepare invoices, and submit payment details to the accounts department.
- Maintain accurate records of customer information, sales activities, transactions, and complaints.
- Coordinate with internal departments such as production, accounts, service, and logistics for smooth operations.
- Monitor market trends, competitor activities, and customer feedback to support sales strategies.
- Prepare and submit daily, weekly, and monthly sales and customer service reports.
- Support promotional activities, campaigns, and product launches when required.
- Assist in after-sales service follow-up to ensure customer satisfaction and retention.

Qualifications and Skills:
- BachelorтАЩs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field (preferred).
- Proficiency in MS Word and Excel is required.
- Proficient typing skills in both Bengali and English are required.
- Prior experience in sales or customer support is mandatory.
- Strong communication, negotiation, and customer handling skills.
- Ability to multitask and manage time effectively.
- Familiarity with CRM software and digital tools will be an advantage.

Key Attributes:
- Strong sense of responsibility and professionalism.
- Excellent customer service mindset with a positive attitude.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.
- Proactive, self-motivated, and target-oriented.
- Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
- Good time management and multitasking ability.
- Attention to detail and commitment to quality work.
- Willingness to learn, adapt, and grow within the organization.

Salary:
Negotiable (Based on experience and qualifications)

Benefits & Compensation:
- Performance-based Incentives
- Subsidized Lunch Facility
- Monthly Mobile Bill Allowance
- Two Eid Bonuses per year
- Annual Salary Increment

Career Growth & Development:
- Clear career progression path
- Training and skill development opportunities
- Performance-based promotions

Apply with CV at: recruitment@greentiger.com.bd

The role requires professionalism, patience, and efficiency in managing a high volume of interactions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Handle inbound and outbound calls in a professional and courteous manner.
- Respond to customer inquiries, complaints, and requests promptly and accurately.
- Provide detailed information about products, services, or company policies.
- Maintain accurate records of customer interactions in the CRM system.
- Follow communication scripts and standard operating procedures (SOPs).
- Escalate complex issues to the supervisor or relevant department when necessary.
- Meet or exceed daily, weekly, and monthly performance targets (e.g., call volume, response time, customer satisfaction).
- Participate in training sessions to enhance product knowledge and communication skills.
- Maintain confidentiality and handle sensitive information responsibly.
- Contribute to a positive team environment and support colleagues as needed.

Salary Review: Half yearly Salary & Benefits: Salary: 9,000 BDT + Incentive (Monthly) Sales Incentive Policy: No incentive applicable for sales up to 60 liters daily. (Example: 60 liters x 0 BDT = 0 BDT) If daily sales exceed 60 liters, incentive will be provided at a rate of 4 BDT per liter above the total liters sold. For example: 61 liters sold тЖТ 61 x 4 = 244 BDT, 100 liters sold тЖТ 100 x 4 = 400 BDT. This will be calculated on a daily basis and considered as additional income to the salary. Increment: Special increments will be available based on sales performance and achieving specified sales targets. Other benefits: Festival bonus and other benefits as per company policy Earning 18,000 - 21,000+ BDT per month is possible by selling 80-100 liters on average. More sales = more income ```

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of Customer Service and Sales Executives:
- Outbound and inbound call management: Making calls to potential customers and receiving calls from interested customers.
- Providing product and service information: Clearly and professionally explaining the company's products and services to customers.
- Lead follow-up and sales conversion: Maintaining regular communication with potential leads and converting them into permanent customers.
- Data management and reporting: Updating daily work tasks and accurately storing customer information on Google Sheets or CRM.
- Providing answers to inquiries: Resolving any customer questions or doubts and assisting with accurate information.
- Achieving sales targets: Meeting the company's defined daily, weekly, and monthly sales targets.
- Maintaining customer support and relationships: Ensuring post-sales services are provided and building long-term business relationships.
- Team coordination: Coordinating with other departments for the smooth running of tasks.
- Participation in training: Attending regular training sessions to learn about products, services, and sales skills.

Courier and Delivery Management:
- Order processing and booking: Booking orders correctly on the courier portal after ensuring customer's order confirmation.
- Delivery tracking: Tracking the current location of the parcel in transit and providing regular updates to the customer.
- Return or parcel follow-up: Resolving any delivery issues or non-receipt of parcels by contacting the courier service and the customer.
- Cash on delivery (COD) coordination: Managing payment received from the courier and promptly resolving any payment-related issues.
- Parcel packing supervision: Ensuring products are packed correctly and sent through the appropriate courier service.

Requirements: Essential Qualifications and Skills (Requirements): HSC/Equivalent pass. Prior experience in tele sales or call center-related work preferred. Excellent verbal and written communication skills. Strong mentality and self-confidence to achieve sales targets. Customer-centric attitude and problem-solving skills. Ability to learn quickly and work under pressure. Additional Skills (Good to Have): Presentation Skills. Problem-Solving Skills. Negotiation Skills. Time management and multitasking abilities. Proficiency in computer and CRM software usage. Experience in customer management through email and social media. Preference given to candidates with proficiency in communication in Bengali and English alongside other languages.

Responsibilities: - Collect blood samples safely (as per clinic protocol) and label samples correctly.

- Prepare slides/smears (when needed) and assist in basic microscopic examination under supervision.
- Record test details properly and report results to the doctor/management on time.
- Store reagents/kits properly, monitor expiry dates, and maintain basic inventory.
- Assist with QC/maintenance tasks (daily cleaning, calibration support, logbook updates).
- Support the clinic team during busy hours and handle tasks responsibly.

Understanding of biosafety, infection control, and waste disposal procedures. Basic computer skills for record keeping/report entry. Personal Requirements Honest, punctual, and responsible. Good communication and teamwork attitude. Willing to work 9 hours daily and handle workload during busy hours. Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled Web Developer (Laravel) with a minimum of 2 years of professional experience in developing robust, scalable web applications. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining high-performance backend and web solutions using the Laravel framework, ensuring smooth integration with frontend components, databases, and third-party services.

Key Responsibilities:
- Develop, maintain, and optimize web applications using the Laravel (PHP) framework.
- Write clean, secure, maintainable, and efficient code following best practices and Laravel standards.
- Collaborate with UI/UX designers, product managers, and frontend developers to implement new features.
- Design and integrate RESTful APIs for web and mobile applications.
- Ensure application performance, security, scalability, and reliability.
- Work with databases such as MySQL / PostgreSQL, including query optimization.
- Debug, troubleshoot, and fix application issues; continuously improve system performance.
- Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control.
- Participate in code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and maintain coding standards.
- Stay up to date with the latest Laravel, PHP, and web development trends.

Requirements: - Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Science & Engineering
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computing & Information System
- Bachelor of Science (BSc) in Computer Science
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computer Engineering
- Master of Science (MSc) in Computing & Information System

Responsibilities: We are a leading manpower recruitment agency looking for a dynamic, energetic, and self-motivated Female Executive to join our team. If you have excellent communication skills and a knack for digital marketing, we want to hear from you!

Requirements: Key responsibilities and deliverables
- Manage end-to-end customer interactions across channels: handle inbound and outbound calls, social media messages, and direct inquiries; follow up promptly to convert leads and resolve issues.
- Develop, implement and maintain a content calendar for social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, LinkedIn), including post concepts, captions, visuals, and publishing schedule.
- Execute community management: respond to comments, moderate conversations, escalate complaints, and maintain a positive brand voice online.
- Support digital campaign setup and monitoring: assist with organic campaigns, coordinate with paid advertising teams, prepare ad copy suggestions, and track basic campaign metrics.
- Maintain accurate records in CRM or lead-tracking tools: log conversations, update lead status, set reminders, and produce basic follow-up reports.
- Collaborate with internal teams (sales, recruitment, creative) to align messaging, share feedback from customers, and refine lead nurturing strategies.
- Contribute to performance improvement by suggesting A/B tests for posts/ads, refining targeting, and documenting what content formats drive the best engagement.

Required technical skills
- Social media management: hands-on experience publishing posts, scheduling content, and monitoring engagement across major platforms (examples: Facebook Business Suite, Creator Studio, Instagram tools).
- Content creation basics: ability to write clear, audience-appropriate captions and produce simple visual assets (examples: Canva, basic image editing); knowledge of post format best practices for engagement.
- Analytics and reporting: familiarity with basic metrics (reach, impressions, engagement rate, click-through, conversion indicators) and ability to compile simple weekly performance summaries using spreadsheets or dashboards.
- CRM and lead management: experience with lead logging, follow-up workflows, and simple segmentation (examples: HubSpot, Zoho, Google Sheets-based trackers).
- Digital communication tools: comfortable using email, chat platforms, video calls, and phone systems; ability to maintain professional written and verbal records of interactions.
- Basic technical literacy: comfortable learning new SaaS tools, troubleshooting common issues (login, permissions, media upload), and following step-by-step platform guides.
- Lead response time and follow-up completion rate.
- Engagement metrics for social content (likes, comments, shares, saves) and follower growth trends.
- Conversion or qualification rate from social and tele-outreach to next-stage action (appointment, application, demo).
- Accuracy and completeness of CRM records and timely reporting o

Responsibilities: Daily accounting and financial transaction management Cash flow management and supplier payment handling Maintaining accurate accounts and preparing reports Ensuring timely collections

Requirements: * Educational Qualification Graduate/Post-graduate in Accounting/Finance; Preference will be given if there is partial qualification in CA (CC)/CMA. * 2-3 years of experience in Accounts/Finance (preferably in FMCG/Manufacturing/Trading). * Proficient in Bengali; capable of email and reporting in English. * Proficiency in Tally/QuickBooks/ERP software; Advanced MS Excel skills required. * High accuracy, attention to detail in work; Knowledge of Bangladesh VAT and Tax laws.

job_title: SIEM Engineer тАУ SOC Tooling & Detection Enablement
job_description:
Responsibilities: Job profile
The SIEM Engineer owns the design, implementation, and health of the SOC monitoring platform(s), ensuring reliable log collection, normalization, alerting, dashboards, and retention across ASA entities. The role partners with SOC analysts to enable effective detections and supports continuous tuning to improve fidelity and coverage.

Responsibilities
- SIEM Platform Operations: Install/configure and maintain SIEM components (e.g., Wazuh manager/indexer/dashboards), ensure availability, performance, and secure configuration.
- Log Source Onboarding: Onboard and maintain telemetry from endpoints/servers, identity providers, email systems, firewalls/VPNs, network devices, and critical applications; validate log completeness and parsing.
- Detection Engineering Support: Create, tune, and maintain detection rules/use cases; optimize for reduced false positives and improved detection of high-risk scenarios.
- Dashboards & Reporting: Build operational and executive dashboards; enable scheduled reporting for SOC KPIs and risk insights.
- Data Management: Manage retention, indexing, storage capacity planning, and data integrity; ensure time synchronization and consistent log formats.
- Automation & Integrations: Integrate SIEM with ticketing/case management, EDR, and other tools to support workflow automation and enrichment (where available).
- Documentation & Standards: Maintain documentation for architecture, log source inventory, parsing, rule sets, and operating procedures; support audit evidence requests.
- Continuous Improvement: Identify telemetry gaps, propose improvements, and support rollout of monitoring standards across countries.

Core competencies
- Strong engineering discipline and troubleshooting capability.
- Ability to translate detection requirements into technical configurations.
- Good stakeholder collaboration: works effectively with analysts and IT teams to onboard logs and resolve issues.
- Documentation discipline and attention to detail.

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Required knowledge and Technical Skills

- Hands-on SIEM administration and engineering.
- Log collection agents, syslog, Windows Event Forwarding concepts, and parsing/normalization.
- Linux administration, scripting (Python/Bash), and basic network troubleshooting.
- Understanding of common security telemetry sources (EDR, IAM/M365, firewalls, proxies, DNS) and how to use them for detection.
- Secure hardening practices for SIEM infrastructure and supporting components.

Education and Experience:

- BachelorтАЩs degree in Cyber Security/ Engineering/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 4тАУ8 yearsтАЩ experience in SIEM/monitoring eng

тЦ╕ Stakeholder Management: Interface with local IT teams, Risk/Compliance, and senior management; provide clear updates during incidents and routine operational reporting.

тЦ╕ Metrics & Continuous Improvement: Own SOC KPIs (MTTA/MTTR, alert-to-incident ratio, false positive rate, coverage), drive improvements, and support audit/regulator evidence requests.

Responsibilities: Core Responsibilities
- Handle day-to-day accounting (cash, bank, petty cash, journals)
- Prepare event-wise budgets and track actual vs planned cost
- Manage vendor bills, advances, and final settlements
- Issue client invoices and follow up for payments (this is critical)
- Maintain receivables & payables reports

Event-Specific Duties
- Control event-wise expense tracking (fabrication, manpower, logistics, F&B, artists, etc.)
- Verify vendor quotations, PO, and bills before payment
- Ensure on-site cash disbursement is documented properly
- Close accounts event-by-event after execution

Financial Control & Compliance
- Maintain VAT, Tax, TDS records
- Assist in monthly closing & audit support
- Ensure company policies are followed in spending
- Maintain proper bill files & digital records

Coordination & Reporting
- Coordinate with Project Managers & Operations team
- Prepare profit/loss reports per event
- Submit management financial reports
- Support decision-making with cost insights

Tools & Skills Expected
- Strong in Excel / Google Sheets
- Knowledge of Tally / accounting software
- Good understanding of event costing
- Detail-oriented, deadline-driven mindset

Requirements: Requirements
- BachelorтАЩs degree in Accounting / Finance / Business Administration
- 2тАУ4 years experience in accounts (event/agency experience = big plus)
- Strong knowledge of basic accounting principles
- Hands-on experience with Tally / accounting software
- Excellent command over MS Excel / Google Sheets
- Ability to manage event-wise costing & expense tracking
- Knowledge of VAT, Tax & compliance (practical, not textbook)
- Experience handling vendor bills, payments & client invoicing
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work under tight deadlines & pressure (events donтАЩt wait)
- Good communication & coordination skills
- Honest, organized, and responsible mindset

Optional (Adds Extra Value)
- Experience in event management / advertising agency
- Knowledge of petty cash & on-site cash handling
- Understanding of budget control & P/L reporting

No need to overpromise. You want someone who can control money when chaos is happening on-ground. ThatтАЩs the real game.

Responsibilities: Welcome customers and assist them in understanding their needs. Provide detailed information about products and give correct answers to customer questions. Perform tasks according to the manager's instructions. Qualifications HSC/SSC Experience in sales and customer service will be considered. Ability to communicate effectively. Social security benefits. Opportunities for career development. Training facilities.

location: Uttara, Anywhere in Dhaka Division, Banasree, Banani, Mohammadpur
job_description:
Responsibilities: Assist in the overall department management and achieve sales targets through regular monitoring, improved customer service, and team motivation. Main Responsibilities Daily Responsibilities Motivate the department team to achieve sales targets. Ensure proper product display, merchandising, and shelf management. Monitor store inventory, product requisition, and customer service, and provide feedback to the store in-charge. Participate in store meetings, identify areas for improvement, and plan for sales and operational quality enhancement. Weekly Responsibilities Plan and implement merchandising, product display, and customer service flow to increase sales. Provide weekly feedback to the area manager following store management guidelines. Coordinate with the store in-charge to ensure product availability according to the designated time. Maintain shelf maintenance according to the display plan and ensure improved customer service. Monthly Responsibilities Participate in HR training programs and encourage team participation. Ensure compliance with company SOP and stock/inventory management policies. Assist management in staff replacement/recruitment as needed. Maintain cleanliness, security, and healthy environment in the store. Assist in stock verification, variance analysis, and expense control. Initiate team development and performance improvement. Annual Responsibilities Follow the Annual Business Plan (ABP) as directed by the area in-charge/manager. Ensure achievement of sales KPI and HR KPI as per company objectives.

Requirements: Minimum Qualifications and Skills Educational Qualification: Minimum SSC Skills: Good verbal communication skills Customer service attitude Proactive and hardworking mentality Experience: No prior experience required (training will be provided) General Responsibilities and Terms Must follow company objectives, policies, and SOPs. May need to take on additional responsibilities and collaborate with other departments when necessary. Must be adaptable to changes in any unit/branch as per management decisions. Must maintain professional conduct and uphold the company's image at all times. Permanent employees must provide a 60-day notice before resigning. Behavioral Expectations Maintain a professional image and attitude in line with the company's values. Show respect to colleagues and customers. Uphold the company's reputation both inside and outside working hours. ЁЯУМ(Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) Responsibilities: Monitoring site security policies Risk identification and reporting Issuing/receiving work permits Safety briefing, PPE check Preparing accident reports Maintaining safety standards according to NEBOSH/IOSH Providing safety guidance to workers Benefits: Salary: 2000-2800 Riyal + Overtime Accommodation: Provided by the company; Food: Own Working hours: 8 hours per day, 6 days a week; (1 day off) Other benefits: Company will provide accommodation and transportation Overtime: As per Saudi labor law Qualifications: ======================================== Age: 21 - 40 years. Candidates outside this age range will not be called for an interview. Educational qualification: Diploma/SSC NEBOSH/IOSH certification is mandatory Must have proficiency in speaking and writing English clearly and fluently. Relevant work experience of 3-5 years is necessary for the job. ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa validity: 2 (two) years - renewable Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports to the interview. The passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Those without a passport should not apply. Payment terms: Payment after obtaining the visa

Responsibilities: HealthOS is looking for a dependable and organized Junior Admin Officer to support the organizationтАЩs daily administrative activities. This role is designed for individuals who can assist in core admin functions including documentation, vendor coordination, asset tracking, and event logistics тАФ all under the supervision of the Admin Officer. The Junior Admin Officer is expected to follow instructions precisely, work with integrity, and ensure smooth administrative execution across both office and operational touchpoints.

Key Responsibilities

- Supplies & Stationery Support:
Assist in tracking office supplies and initiating restocking requests when needed.

- Asset Documentation:
Maintain records of company equipment and infrastructure, ensuring updates are accurate and timely.

- Bill & Utility Tracking:
Monitor rent, electricity, internet, and other utility bills to ensure timely processing and documentation.

- Compliance Document Preparation:
Help gather and prepare necessary paperwork for legal and operational licenses (e.g., trade license, fire safety).

- Vendor Communication:
Liaise with cleaning, maintenance, and service vendors, ensuring work is completed as instructed by the Admin Officer.

- Event Support:
Provide logistical assistance in organizing internal meetings, training sessions, and team events.

- Filing & Records Management:
Maintain organized digital and physical files for all bills, contracts, and administrative documents.

- Data Entry & Report Assistance:
Input data into administrative spreadsheets and assist in compiling reports using Google Docs/Sheets.

Career Path
This is an entry-level administrative position offering valuable hands-on experience in organizational operations, with the potential to grow into a mid-level role based on performance and dedication.

Operational Context
At HealthOS, the Junior Admin Officer plays a supportive administrative role under the direct supervision of the Admin Officer. This position is ideal for individuals early in their administrative career, and includes both desk-based tasks and occasional field responsibilities. The Junior Admin Officer helps manage documentation, vendor follow-up, asset tracking, and event logistics. Precision, honesty, and reliability are critical to success in this role.

Responsibilities: LAMB is a well-run major mission Hospital, Community Health Development, Training and Research organization. Services cover more than 6.3 million people in North West Bangladesh.

There is a vacancy for the following regular position based at LAMB Hospital, Parbatipur, Dinajpur. The Internal Auditor is responsible for planning, executing, and reporting on operational, financial regulatory, and compliance-related audits of LAMB departments and projects, including government compliance, under the direction of the Finance Director (or Executive Director in his/her absence). Review and examine data, looking for patterns and identifying shortages and loss. Report in English, findings, conclusions, and/or recommendations for improvements of processes and procedures (based on policy and best practice) to management of department and projects. Improve LAMB operations through recommendations for bringing systematic and disciplined approaches to the effectiveness of risk management and control processes. Provide support whenever needed or as required by the Finance Director and the Executive Director.

Requirements: Essential Requirements:
MasterтАЩs degree in Finance or Accounting. CACC registered auditor will be given preference. At least 3 to 5 years working experience in internal auditing or over 10 yearsтАЩ experience with multiple donors or projects. Good understanding and training on various kinds of Government laws/regulations such as VAT and Tax, income tax, etc. Ability to scrutinize large amounts of data and to compile detailed reports. High attention to detail and excellent analytical skills. Preference will be given with external auditing experience in a creditable audit firm in Bangladesh. A valid motorcycle driving license is required. Willingness to travel and stay overnight in field centers as required.

Age: Maximum 45 Years.

Salary: Minimum Tk. 30,000 per month Gross or equivalent to approximately Tk. 4,18,484 per annum, inclusive of all benefits. The remuneration package includes a provident fund, festival allowance once per year, medical benefits, critical illness and death benefits, and recreation.

Job Location: Parbatipur, Dinajpur.

Qualified candidates are requested to apply with a cover letter along with an updated CV (mentioning two references name), all educational & experience certificates, NID and recent passport size photograph to the HR Department, LAMB, P.O. N.B. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Any kind of persuasion will be considered as disqualified.

Responsibilities: LAMB is a well-run major mission Hospital, Community Health Development, Training and Research organization. Services cover more than 6.3 million people in North West Bangladesh.

There is a vacancy for the following contractual position based at LAMB Hospital at LAMB Hospital under the Human Resources Department, Parbatipur, Dinajpur. The Head of Human Resources is responsible for the strategic leadership, management, and administration of the Human Resources (HR) function. This includes employee relations, recruitment and staffing, organizational design, succession planning, performance management, compensation and benefits, employee recognition, HR policy development, and learning and development. The position also supports the Executive Director in fostering an organization-wide culture of inclusion, cooperation, staff development, and adherence to principles of non-discrimination, justice, and accountability. Provides guidance and support to all levels of management and staff on HR-related policies, employee relations issues, and procedures. Serves as a member of the Management Team and as a liaison to the Personnel Committee.

Requirements: Essential Requirements:
Masters/MBA preferably in Human Resource Management/Business Studies or any other relevant field from any recognized university/institution. Post Graduated Certification in Human Resources required. At least 10 years of progressively responsible experience in Human Resources leadership. Demonstrated ability to lead the fair and consistent implementation of Human Resources policies and procedures. Proven track record in driving change and leading transformational HR initiatives. Experience in the not-for-profit sector is considered an asset. Strong communication and leadership abilities, along with effective rapport-building skills, are essential for this role. Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills are required.

Salary: Tk.72,500 per month gross. Other benefits include Medical Benefit, Provident Fund, and a festival allowance (100% of basic salary) once per year and critical illness & death benefit.

Job Location: Parbatipur, Dinajpur.

Qualified candidates are requested to apply with a cover letter along with an updated CV (mentioning two references name), all educational & experience certificates, NID and recent passport size photograph to the HR Department, LAMB, P.O. Parbatipur, Dinajpur-5250, Bangladesh; alternatively, email to hrjobs@lambproject.org; Please mention the position name on top of the envelope or with the subject line of the email.

Application Deadline: 17 March 2026.

N.B. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Any kind of persuasion will be considered as disqualified.

job_title: Junior Data Analyst (Night Shift - Work From Home)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a renowned multinational ITES company with over 11 years of experience. We are excited to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates who are willing to work night shifts. Only female applicants are encouraged to apply for this position, and female staff members have the option to work from home.

Responsibilities and key learning areas:
- Conducting extensive online research on North American businesses and their corporate practices.
- Hosting regular meetings with managers, taking notes, and preparing meeting minutes.
- Organizing data in spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, etc.
- Making telemarketing calls and hosting conference calls as required.
- Updating CRM systems, adding notes, and setting up drip plans for texts and emails.
- Maintaining internal communication and completing individual assignments.
- Engaging in external communication with corporate stakeholders.
- Participating in collaboration meetings, workshops with industry colleagues, BASIS, etc.
- Updating daily activities and work status on a dedicated individual tracking platform.

Educational Requirements:
- Bachelor's/Master's students from any UGC approved University/College.
- Diploma students currently enrolled are also encouraged to apply.
- Candidates from any discipline/department are welcome, and all will be treated equally.

Compensation & Other info:
- Work From Home
- 6 days per week.
- Office Schedule (Night Shift)
- Timely salary payments.
- 10 paid holidays per year.
- 15 casual paid leaves per year.
- All employees have access to loan facilities, including probationary employees.
- Employees, their parents, spouses, and children receive a 35% discount at Ibn Sina Hospital.

Requirements: Additional Requirements

- Age 18 to 32 years
- Only females are allowed to apply.
- Call center experience will get priority.
- English medium background will get priority.
- Must be fluent in English.
- Experience in sales campaigns will get priority.

job_title: SOC Analyst тАУ Level 1 (L1) тАУ Monitoring & Triage
job_description:
Responsibilities: Job profile

The SOC Analyst (L1) is responsible for continuous monitoring, first-level triage, and initial response actions based on approved SOC playbooks. The role focuses on accurate classification of alerts, rapid escalation of true security events, and maintaining high-quality case records to support investigations.

Responsibilities

- Monitor SIEM and security tooling queues; review alerts, events, and anomalies across endpoints, identity, email, and network sources.
- Perform initial triage: validate alert context, enrich with basic data (user, host, IP, geolocation, asset criticality), and determine severity.
- Create and maintain incident tickets with complete evidence, timeline, and actions taken; ensure accurate categorization and tagging.
- Execute approved first-response playbooks (e.g., phishing triage, user verification steps, initial containment requests, password reset escalation).
- Escalate suspected incidents to L2 within defined SLAs; ensure smooth handover with clear notes and supporting artifacts.
- Support SOC reporting by maintaining disciplined ticket hygiene and shift handover notes.
- Continuously improve alert quality by flagging false positives, missing telemetry, or recurring issues to the SOC Lead/SIEM Engineer.

Core competencies

- Meticulous attention to detail and strong documentation discipline.
- Ability to work shifts and remain effective under pressure.
- Curiosity and structured thinkingтАФable to follow playbooks while spotting anomalies.
- Strong communication and teamwork skills.

Job Nature / Shift:

This role may be shift-based to support SOC coverage requirements (including weekends and public holidays as per shift rota). Shift patterns will be structured (e.g., 8-hour shifts) with rest days managed through the rota.

Reporting line

The SOC Analyst shall report to SOC Lead / Incident Response Lead (as applicable)

Compensation & Benefits:

- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Education and Experience:
- BachelorтАЩs degree in Cyber Security/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 1тАУ3 yearsтАЩ experience in SOC operations, IT security, NOC with security monitoring exposure, or related discipline.
- Good written and spoken English; able to produce clear tickets and shift handovers.
- Comfortable operating in a multi-country environment and supporting distributed teams.

Required knowledge and Technical Skills:
- Basic understanding of cybersecurity concepts: malware, phishing, brute force, lateral movement, data exfiltration, and common attack patterns.
- Foundational SIEM experience (alert review, dashboards, simple queries). Experience with Wazuh is preferred.
- Basic understanding of Windows/Linux events, authen

job_title: Sr. SOC Analyst тАУ Investigation & Incident Handling
job_description:
Responsibilities: Job profile
The Sr. SOC Analyst conducts in-depth investigations of escalated alerts and suspected incidents, confirms scope and impact, coordinates containment actions with IT and business stakeholders, and drives incidents to closure with appropriate evidence and reporting.

Responsibilities
- Investigate escalated alerts using SIEM/EDR/email/identity/network telemetry to confirm incident validity, scope, and root cause hypotheses.
- Perform correlation across multiple data sources and build incident timelines; identify affected users, systems, and data at risk.
- Coordinate containment and remediation with local IT teams (endpoint isolation, account disable/reset, blocking IOCs, firewall/VPN actions) per approved procedures.
- Lead incident communications for assigned cases: maintain stakeholder updates, ensure actions are tracked, and escalate to Lead Information Security when thresholds are met.
- Collect and preserve evidence in line with internal standards (logs, screenshots, hashes, email headers, EDR artifacts) to support audit/regulatory reporting.
- Support development and refinement of playbooks/runbooks and detection logic by providing feedback to SIEM Engineer and Lead Information Security.
- Conduct post-incident reviews for assigned incidents and propose preventive controls and monitoring improvements.

Core competencies
- Strong analytical and investigative mindset; able to distinguish signal from noise.
- Structured incident handling and stakeholder coordination.
- High-quality documentation and reporting, including executive-ready summaries when required.
- Mentorship: supports L1 analysts through guidance and coaching.

Reporting line
The Sr. SOC Analyst shall report to Lead Information Security (as applicable)

Compensation & Benefits:
- Competitive and attractive salary package will be offered to deserving candidates based on experience and skill set.
- Festival Bonus
- Provident Fund & Gratuity
- Life & Health Insurance (IPD & OPD)
- Annual Health Check-up
- Baisakhi Allowance
- Vehicle Loan Scheme / Vehicle Maintenance Allowance

Requirements: Education and Experience:
- BachelorтАЩs degree in CSE/IT/Information Security or similar.
- 3тАУ6 yearsтАЩ experience in SOC/incident response/security operations; financial services experience preferred.
- Experience with SIEM and Microsoft/Azure security solutions is preferred.

Certifications (preferred):
- Incident handling/SOC: GCIH, GCIA, CEH, Security+, or equivalent.
- Vendor certifications (Microsoft security, Wazuh) are an advantage.

Required knowledge and Technical Skills:
- Hands-on investigation skills across SIEM, EDR, email security, and identity logs.
- Good understanding of Windows security events, common attacker techniques, and incident scoping methods.
- Ability to run basic threat hunting queries and pivot between telemetry sources.
- Understanding of financial services threat scenarios (phishing/BEC, credential theft, privileged access abuse, ranso

- Yearly recreation based on performance.

- Fresh graduates and last-semester students can apply.
- Educational requirements can be relaxed if there is over 1 year of experience in a BPO/international call center.

Additional Requirements

- Age 20 to 32 years
- Only Males are allowed to apply.
- Call centre experience will get priority.
- English medium background will get priority.
- Must be fluent in English.
- Experience in sales campaigns will get priority.

job_description:
Responsibilities: The company SANS International Company in Saudi Arabia is currently hiring drivers/operators (JCB/Shovel) ! Benefits: Salary: 1500-2000 Riyal + Overtime Accommodation: Provided by the company; Food: Own Working hours: 8 hours per day, 6 days a week; (1 day off) Other benefits: Company will provide accommodation and transportation Overtime: As per Saudi labor law Job Responsibilities: Operating heavy equipment such as JCB, Shovel, or other heavy equipment with skill. Performing tasks like excavation, loading, leveling, and material handling. Daily inspection of the machine, checking oil-grease, and reporting any damages. Operating the machine safely and correctly on-site as per the drawing/instruction. Following safety policies, PPE, and Permit to Work (PTW) regulations. Ensuring safe driving by following designated routes, applicable traffic laws, and all company safety standards. ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read carefully and then apply for the job) ======================================== Age: 21-40 years. Candidates outside this age range will not be called for an interview. Educational Qualification: SSC or equivalent. A valid driving license is mandatory. Proficiency in speaking and writing English clearly and fluently is required. 2-3 years of practical experience in relevant work is necessary. ЁЯУЖ Pre-selection Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Validity: 2 (two) years - non-renewable. Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports to the interview. The passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Those without a passport should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa.

job_title: рж╕рж┐ржнрж┐рж▓ ржЗржЮрзНржЬрж┐ржирж┐ржпрж╝рж╛рж░ (Civil Engineer)тАУSANS International Co.-рж╕рзМржжрж┐ ржЖрж░ржм
job_description:
Responsibilities: A skilled and experienced Civil Engineer is being recruited for the renowned Saudi Arabian company SANS International Co. . Responsibilities: Prepare and supervise the design, planning, and execution of construction projects. Ensure quality of work on project sites and complete tasks within specified deadlines. Provide guidance to workers and technicians and ensure safety. Prepare material lists (BOQ) as per requirements and control budget. Maintain regular communication with clients and project managers and provide work reports. Benefits: Salary: 3,000 - 4,000 Saudi Riyal + Overtime Accommodation: Provided by the company; Food: Self Working Hours: 8 hours per day, 6 days a week; (1 day off) Other Benefits: Company will provide accommodation and transportation Overtime: As per Saudi labor law ЁЯУМ(Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Educational Qualification: B.Sc in Civil Engineering. Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training. Experience: Minimum 4-5 years of practical experience in civil engineering. Candidates with international work experience will have an advantage. Language: Proficiency in English or Arabic language. ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Duration: 2 years - Renewable Passport: All applicants must bring both new and old passports to the interview. Passport must be valid for at least 1.5 years. Applicants without passports should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa
