Responsibilities: We are looking for a skilled and energetic 3D Designer as the digital world continues to expand, the role of a 3D Designer has become more essential than ever. Whether it's for video games, films, architectural visualization, or virtual reality, 3D Designers bring concepts to life with stunning visual effects and intricate details. This page lists the job description for a 3D Designer/GRAPHIC DESIGNER/DRAFTSMAN. Read on to understand the responsibilities, qualifications, and skills needed for this dynamic and creative role.

We are seeking a 3D designer to create high-quality three-dimensional Render images, models, and animations for our company. You will collaborate in brainstorming sessions with a team of illustrators, designers, and engineers to develop initial sketches, wireframes, and prototypes of images and product representations. You will edit existing 3D models and create new ones. The right candidate will have an exceptional understanding of 3DS MAX, ADOBE ILLUSTRATOR and CAD software, stay up to date with the best techniques and solutions for design, and remain compliant with company design standards.

Below are some of the responsibilities of a 3D designer:
- Collaborate with graphic designers, illustrators, architects, engineers, etc. to create storyboards
- Create 3D images, Creating graphic Art, and interactive objects using CAD software
- Conceptualize and build virtual reality environments
- Communicate directly with clients, team members, and stakeholders regarding project targets, progress, and final products.

job_description:
Responsibilities: At the heart of Ashulia, a renowned institution, Swadesh Hospital, will be hiring experienced marketing officers. Interested candidates from the Ashulia area are encouraged to apply promptly.

- All services of the hospital (doctors, diagnostics, surgery, etc.) will be promoted and branded.
- Building and maintaining relationships with various clinics, diagnostic centers, pharmacies, and healthcare professionals.
- Negotiating contracts/agreements with corporate clients, insurance companies, and organizations.
- Creating a network of patient referrals through field visits.
- Organizing camps, free medical check-ups, and health awareness programs.
- Coordinating advertising on social media and online platforms.
- Achieving monthly targets and reporting.

Salary and Benefits:
- Competitive salary + incentive based on targets.
- Mobile bill and TA/DA.
- Provident fund/bonus (as per company policy).

Job Location: Baipail, Ashulia (Dhaka)

Requirements: Minimum Bachelor's degree (Educational qualification may be relaxed for experienced candidates). Minimum 3 (three) years of experience in Hospital/Diagnostic/Pharma sector required. Good communication skills and negotiation skills are essential. Must have the mindset to work in field marketing.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Necessity Service Limited (An institution approved by the Government of the People's Republic of Bangladesh) As part of the program aimed at eradicating hunger, poverty, and unemployment in Bangladesh, Necessity Service Limited is recruiting personnel in various districts of Khulna Division. Qualified and enthusiastic candidates are invited to apply for the ongoing operational and monitoring activities of the institution. Under the special program of the institution, customers will have the opportunity to purchase essential commodities (rice, lentils, oil, soap, flour, sugar, salt) at a 50% discounted price for the next 5 (five) years through regular monthly market purchases for 10 (ten) months. This program aims to effectively implement the initiative by providing employment opportunities to the workforce. Position: Area Sales Manager (ASM) Location: Each district of Khulna Division's respective police stations Job Type: Full-time Educational Qualifications Minimum HSC/ Honors or equivalent Preference will be given to candidates with experience in sales and management-related work Responsibilities Conducting and monitoring activities in the designated area Team coordination and monitoring Ensuring customer service and program implementation Achieving set targets Salary and Benefits Monthly salary: 40,000 - 50,000 BDT Incentives and target bonuses Promotion opportunities Opportunity to work in your own area Application Process To learn more or to apply, please call or SMS: ЁЯУЮ 01952000042 (Office Admin) Corporate Office Address Dhaka Office: House-30, Road-02, Banani, Dhaka Necessity Service Limited Your service, by your side.

Responsibilities: New Era Consultancy, a leading visa and immigration consultancy firm, is seeking dynamic, self-motivated, and customer-oriented individuals for the position of Counselor. The ideal candidate should have previous experience in visa consultancy services, excellent communication skills, and a dedication to assisting clients in achieving their international goals.

Key Responsibilities:
- Provide professional counseling and guidance to clients on visa applications, studying abroad, and immigration processes.
- Maintain positive communication with clients and promptly respond to inquiries and follow-ups.
- Prepare and manage documentation accurately, ensuring all records are up to date.
- Coordinate with the operations and processing team to ensure a seamless client experience.
- Stay informed about visa regulations, embassy guidelines, and country-specific requirements.
- Contribute to achieving team and company objectives through proactive engagement.

Requirements: Freshers with a strong willingness to learn and adapt are also encouraged to apply. Excellent verbal and written communication skills (English proficiency preferred). Strong organizational and problem-solving abilities. Office Hours: 10:00 a.m. тАУ 6:00 p.m.

Responsibilities: Key Accounts Executive will be responsible for generating B2B sales for IT solutions (software, SaaS, system integration) and HR services (recruitment, staffing, payroll, RPO). The role focuses on acquiring new corporate clients, maintaining strong relationships, and driving revenue growth.

Identify and approach potential corporate clients for IT and HR service solutions.

Generate qualified B2B leads through cold calling, networking, LinkedIn, and referrals.

Conduct client meetings, needs analysis, and solution presentations.

Prepare proposals, service agreements, and pricing quotations.

Negotiate contracts and close deals.

Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets.

Develop long-term partnerships with HR heads, IT managers, and decision-makers.

Coordinate with technical and HR operations teams to ensure smooth service delivery.

Maintain CRM database and prepare regular sales reports.

Job Location: Gazipur

Requirements: - Bachelor's degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
- 2-5 years of experience in B2B sales (IT solutions or HR services preferred)
- Strong understanding of corporate sales cycle and consultative selling
- Excellent communication and negotiation skills
- Ability to present technical or service-based solutions confidently
- Proficiency in MS Office and CRM software

Skills we need:
- Knowledge of SaaS products, recruitment process outsourcing (RPO), or staffing solutions
- Strong lead generation and closing ability
- Relationship-building with corporate decision-makers
- Target-driven and self-motivated mindset

Key Accounts Executive will be responsible for generating B2B sales for IT solutions (software, SaaS, system integration) and HR services (recruitment, staffing, payroll, RPO). The role focuses on acquiring new corporate clients, maintaining strong relationships, and driving revenue growth. Identify and approach potential corporate clients for IT and HR service solutions Generate qualified B2B leads through cold calling, networking, LinkedIn, and referrals Conduct client meetings, needs analysis, and solution presentations Prepare proposals, service agreements, and pricing quotations Negotiate contracts and close deals Achieve monthly, quarterly, and annual sales targets Develop long-term partnerships with HR heads, IT managers, and decision-makers Coordinate with technical and HR operations teams to ensure smooth service delivery Maintain CRM database and prepare regular sales reports Job Location: Gazipur

Responsibilities: Need to sell clothes in the showroom Work according to the directions of the supervisor to achieve sales targets Provide the best service to customers through proper communication Ensure customer satisfaction through customer service Arrange and display merchandise Proper packaging must be done according to the rules Adhere to rules and laws related to cleanliness and hygiene in the workplace Increase sales through informing customers about offers and promotions Regularly inspect the expiry date of products and report to the supervisor Assist in receiving goods from warehouse and suppliers (loading) and arranging them at designated locations and in the sales area Duty from 10 am to 9 pm Handle customers with care and good behavior

Requirements: Educational Qualification: HSC and SSC Goal-oriented Sales Incentive Eid Bonus: 2 (Annual) Salary Review: Annual Excellent Working Environment

job_description:
Responsibilities: Educational Qualification: JSC/SSC/HSC. Duty: 12 hours. Salary: 19,500 to 21,500 taka. Number of Positions: 30 Age: 18 to 60 years. Preference will be given to retired defense candidates. No experience required. It is our responsibility to train you for the job. Joining is mandatory for the company's match in the first month. Candidates who are called must bring necessary documents, wear uniform, and bring 30,000 taka for food expenses for the first month. Selected candidates will be informed directly via SMS or WhatsApp about joining details. Documents required for joining: 1. Educational certificates. 2. Copy of birth certificate or national ID card. 3. Two passport-sized photos. Salary is paid from the 5th to the 7th of each month. We do not take any financial transactions or money as security for employment in our company. Interested candidates must be mentally prepared to work at any location mentioned. Workplace: Jatrabari, Rampura, Uttara, Mirpur Gazipur Dhaka. Work Areas: Showroom, construction sites, garments, apartments, houses, garages, metro rail, markets. Contact directly for any information about the job and send your CV via WhatsApp: ЁЯУЮ 01727052574 Interview location: Gazipur Chowrasta Baghdad Tower.

Requirements: тАО Retired defense candidates will be given priority.

company_address: NOVO TOWER, LEVEL 9 270, Tejgaon I/A, Dhaka-1208, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: Assist category managers in selecting products, planning stock, and managing day-to-day operations to ensure smooth execution and sales growth. Regularly visit markets to monitor consumer trends, competitor pricing, and identify new product opportunities with a market-aware approach. Work with suppliers to procure products, negotiate promotional terms, and ensure timely availability for campaigns and peak demand. Monitor sales and inventory levels for assigned accounts, prepare concise weekly performance reports to guide decision-making. Identify and approach new corporate clients for bulk orders, create customized proposals and accurate quotations to secure business. Maintain organized records of clients and suppliers, track order progress, and proactively follow up to ensure timely delivery and satisfaction. Negotiate terms and address client concerns with a customer-centric approach to foster strong, long-term relationships. Collaborate with internal teams to implement merchandising and promotional initiatives that boost product visibility and drive results.

Requirements: - Minimum Bachelor's degree (any discipline).
- Basic computer skills (MS Excel, Word).
- Strong communication and negotiation ability.
- Ability to travel locally and work in markets.
- Honest, proactive, and eager to learn.
- Preference for candidates from the same locality or surrounding area.

We offer a collaborative work culture, professional growth opportunities, and performance-linked benefits for the right candidate.
Other Benefits: Two Festival Bonus, Mobile Allowance, Subsidized Lunch, LFA, Gratuity, and PF.

Assist category managers with product selection, stock planning, and dayтАСtoтАСday operations to support smooth execution and sales growth. Visit markets regularly to track consumer trends, competitor pricing, and emerging product opportunities with an attentive, marketтАСaware approach. Coordinate with suppliers to source products, negotiate promotional terms, and ensure timely availability for campaigns and peak demand. Monitor sales and inventory levels across assigned accounts, compiling concise weekly performance reports to inform decisions. Identify and pursue new corporate clients for bulk orders, preparing tailored proposals and accurate quotations to win business. Maintain organized client and supplier records, track order progress, and proactively follow up to ensure timely delivery and satisfaction. Negotiate terms and resolve client concerns with a customerтАСfocused attitude to build strong, longтАСterm relationships. Collaborate with internal teams to implement merchandising and promotional initiatives that enhance product visibility and drive results.

job_description: Responsibilities: McDonald's - Saudi Arabia is hiring for the position of Service Crew for the 6th batch! ЁЯФ╣ Promotion opportunity to become a Manager/In-Charge based on qualifications and performance. ЁЯФ╣ Leave: 42 days off with salary every two years. ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read carefully before applying) ======================================== тЬФя╕П Age: 21 - 26 years. company_address: Sophia Villa, House 38, 3rd Floor (Lift-3), Garib-E-Newaz Ave., Sector 11, Uttara, Dhaka.
job_description:
Responsibilities: EuroZone Education, a leading student consultancy firm, is hiring Study Abroad Consultants to join our dynamic team in Uttara. This role is ideal for individuals passionate about education, international opportunities, and client engagement. You will be responsible for guiding students through the entire study abroad process тАФ from university selection and application submission to visa documentation and pre-departure support.

- Counsel and advise students and guardians on overseas education opportunities in various countries (Finland, Denmark, Belgium, Lithuania, Sweden, Italy, Estonia, Latvia, etc.)
- Assist students with application processes including documentation, university selection, and SOP/LOI guidance
- Maintain up-to-date knowledge of admission requirements, scholarship options, and visa onboarding procedures
- Communicate with partner universities and ensure accurate and timely submissions
- Follow up regularly with leads and ensure conversion through personalized guidance
- Coordinate with internal departments to deliver a seamless client experience
- Meet individual and team targets aligned with company goals

Requirements: Minimum Bachelor's degree required Expert in MS Office/Google Docs and Sheets and email communication Previous full-time work experience is an advantage Strong written and verbal communication skills in English Excellent interpersonal, counseling, and problem-solving abilities Professional attitude with a willingness to learn and grow in the field of international education

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a creative and results-driven Marketing Expert & Graphic Designer to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate should have strong skills in digital marketing strategies and graphic design to help grow our brand presence, manage campaigns, and create engaging visual content.

- Create eye-catching graphics for social media, ads, and promotional materials
- Manage social media pages and content scheduling
- Design banners, posters, brochures, and marketing creatives
- Analyze campaign performance and optimize marketing strategies

- Strong knowledge of Canva, Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, or similar tools
- Experience with social media marketing and paid ads
- Creative mindset with attention to detail
- Good communication skills in English
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Video editing skills (optional but a plus)
- SEO and content marketing knowledge
- Experience with marketing analytics tools

We are looking for a creative and results-driven *Marketing Expert & Graphic Designer* to join our team remotely. The ideal candidate should have strong skills in digital marketing strategies and graphic design to help grow our brand presence, manage campaigns, and create engaging visual content. * Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns (Facebook, Instagram, Google Ads, etc.) * Create eye-catching graphics for social media, ads, and promotional materials * Manage social media pages and content scheduling * Design banners, posters, brochures, and marketing creatives * Analyze campaign performance and optimize marketing strategies * Maintain brand consistency in all designs and marketing materials

job_description:
Responsibilities: Earn up to 20,000 taka by joining as a Foodpanda rider New riders in Dhaka can get joining bonus up to 1,500 taka* Motorbike: 1,500 taka Cycle: 1,500 taka On foot: 1,500 taka Attractive benefits you will receive: Weekly quest bonus, surge fee bonus, new rider bonus, and opportunities for extra earnings. You can set your own working hours in your preferred zone and receive your earned money at the end of the week (every Monday). Loyalty points and deals: Enjoy discount deals using loyalty points on every delivery (1 point = 1 order). Benefit from discount deals from partners like Duronto Cycle, RFL (home appliances), Janix (health services), and more. Requirements for application: Must have an Android phone Must be a rider with a cycle, scooter, motorbike, or on foot National ID card Age must be 18+ Job type Full-time Working hours 9 hours Working shift Day shift

Responsibilities: Job Summary: We are seeking a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor to develop visual content for our matrimonial team. The ideal candidate should have strong editing skills, creativity, and the ability to work closely with the In-Charge and marketing team to ensure professional and engaging video content. Key Responsibilities: - Edit raw footage into high-quality, professional videos.
- Add text, names, details, company logo, branding elements, and subtitles.
- Create promotional videos for live sessions and social media campaigns.
- Prepare short clips, reels, and highlight videos from live programs.
- Ensure video clarity, proper color correction, and audio quality, also add background music and sound effects.
- Maintain confidentiality of client information and media files.
- Prepare videos optimized for Facebook, YouTube, TikTok, and other platforms.
- Deliver projects within deadlines.
- Coordinate with the In-Charge and other team members and also execute any additional tasks as assigned by supervisor.

Requirements: Proficiency in video editing software (Adobe Premiere Pro / CapCut / Filmora or similar)
Creative mindset with strong attention to detail
Good understanding of social media content trends
Ability to work under pressure and manage multiple projects while meeting deadlines
Prior experience is preferred

Working Time:

10 AM to 6 PM

company_address: Sonir Akhra, Bus Stop, UCB Bank Building 6th Floor, Kadamtoli Dhaka, Dhaka 1236
job_description:
Responsibilities: ЁЯУв Job Opportunity at BuzzBlu Team!
ЁЯз╛ Position: Accounts Assistant
ЁЯУН Location: Shanir Akhara, Dhaka
ЁЯТ░ Salary: 12,000-18,000 BDT (Based on skills and experience)

тЬЕ Job Responsibilities:
1. Maintain daily sales and expense accounts - track daily sales, payment collection, refunds, and petty cash.
2. Update accounts on Google Sheet/Excel - digitally record and organize all transactions.
3. Prepare investment and finance reports monthly - analyze profit-loss, customer transactions, and expenses.
4. Calculate staff salaries, incentives, and attendance - prepare salaries and incentives based on office hours, attendance, and targets.
5. Review bank and merchant transactions - check and reconcile bKash/cash/bank payments and receipts.
6. Maintain separate and organized accounts for each wing - keep records in designated files or sheets, maintain monthly folders, and document any changes with names and dates.

Additional Responsibilities:
- Record and track daily financial transactions.
- Prepare and verify invoices and receipts.
- Prepare bank reconciliation and cash flow reports.
- Create monthly worksheets and verify financial data.
- Prepare reports on expenses and income.
- Monitor accounts payable and receivable.
- Prepare stock and inventory reports.
- Assist in tax-related activities.
- Perform other tasks in the accounts department such as filing and documentation.

Qualifications:
- Bachelor's degree in Accounting or equivalent, or HSC or equivalent.
- Familiarity with accounting systems and computer skills.
- Ability to enter data quickly and accurately.
- Strong communication skills and ability to work in a team.
- Good understanding of accounting software and Microsoft Excel.

Experience:
- 1-2 years of relevant experience in the field.
- Knowledge of banking or financial reporting is a plus.

Offer:
- Attractive salary and benefits.
- Opportunities for professional development.

Requirements:
- At least 1 year of experience in accounting.
- Proficiency in Excel or Google Sheets.
- Attention to detail and accuracy in accounting.
- Consciousness of confidentiality and responsibility.
- Time management and team-oriented skills.
- Priority given to experienced hijabi/religious female candidates.

Benefits:
- Separate prayer facilities and prayer bonus at the office.
- 4 days of flexible leave per month.
- Timely salary, performance bonus, and attendance incentives.
- Opportunities for promotion and skill development.
- Self-improvement bonus for reading and reviewing a book monthly.

If you are passionate about accurate accounting, timeliness, and responsibility, then this position is for you.

Responsibilities: The Digital Sales team relies heavily on field-level freelancers for lead generation. To ensure the Acquisition team has a steady and sufficient lead pipeline for both Shops and Restaurants, we need your support for freelancer hiring for lead generation.

What are our current offerings for the freelancers?

To encourage active participation, we are providing rewards for each qualified lead:

- BDT 75 per qualified Restaurant lead
- BDT 60 per qualified Shop lead
- Payment disbursement: Processed by HR and released by the end of the next month

Qualifying Criteria:

- Leads must be new and not available in Salesforce.
- SKU Limit: 11 items
- All leads must be submitted through the Google Form.
- Leads must fall within existing delivery zones. Freelancers can verify coverage by checking the Bangladesh Delivery Map.

Support & Training:

The Digital Sales team is willing to conduct short training sessions for freelancers on how to identify potential leads and how to submit them properly.

At Porao Technology, we value performance, professional growth, and talent recognition. This is an excellent opportunity for individuals who are ambitious and eager to build a strong career in sales and communication. Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputable multinational ITES company that has been operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates who are willing to work night shifts. Male candidates are encouraged to apply for the available positions. FCBL provides an excellent workplace located in the heart of Banani for male staff.

Job Responsibilities:
- Executing daily voice operations and generating high-quality warm leads through outbound telemarketing campaigns.
- Operating specialized North American real estate management initiatives, focusing on portfolio onboarding and management.
- Reviewing daily performance reports to identify discrepancies, revenue leakages, and operational errors for higher management.
- Liaising with probationary personnel to identify performance obstacles and facilitate cultural integration.
- Identifying and resolving interpersonal or departmental conflicts and providing strategic recommendations.
- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Performing internal audits to mitigate opportunity loss and uphold superior standards for stakeholder collaboration.

Employment Status: Full-time
Job Location: Dhaka

Compensation & Other Benefits:
- On-time salary
- Monthly and yearly recreation based on performance
- Unlimited NESCAF├Й
- Yearly 10 paid holidays and 15 casual paid leaves
- Loan facilities for all employees, including probationary employees
- 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital for employees, their parents, spouses, and children
- Company-sponsored 3 annual programs

Read Before Apply:
Visit https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction about yourself in English. Save the audio file and send it as an attachment along with your resume to apply@futurecloudbd.com. The voice recording is to verify fluency in English, so do your best in the audio recording.

Requirements: Educational Requirements

- Fresh graduates and last-semester students can apply.
- Educational requirements can be relaxed if there is over 1 year of experience in a BPO/international call center.
- Minimum 1 Year experience.

Responsibilities: A 100% export oriented Wig Manufacturing factory is looking for dynamic & highly motivated professional to fill up the following position:

- Supervise and manage production floor technical operations.
- Ensure product quality meets export standards.
- Troubleshoot technical issues in manufacturing processes.
- Coordinate with management and production teams.
- Maintain safety, efficiency, and compliance standards.
- Train and guide junior technical staff when required.

Requirements: If you feel you are the right person for this position, please apply within 07 (Seven) days from the published date with a detailed CV, telephone number, and a recent passport size color photograph to the following address:

Trillion Gold Ltd.
Fatehjangpur, Chirirbandor, Dinajpur, Bangladesh.

Experience Requirements:
- 3-4 years of practical experience in the related field (Wig / Hair Processing / Manufacturing / Technical Operations preferred).
- Strong technical knowledge in factory production processes.

Additional Requirements:
- Excellent communication skills.
- Must be fluent in Chinese or English (both spoken and written).
- Strong leadership and problem-solving skills.
- Ability to work under pressure and manage production efficiency.
- Citizens of any country are eligible to apply.

A 100% export oriented Wig Manufacturing factory is looking for dynamic & highly motivated professional to fill up the following position: Supervise and manage production floor technical operations. Ensure product quality meets export standards. Troubleshoot technical issues in manufacturing processes. Coordinate with management and production teams. Maintain safety, efficiency, and compliance standards. Train and guide junior technical staff when required.

Responsibilities: Provide safe Pick & Drop service to employees according to the designated route and schedule. Operate Manual Hiace vehicles with skill and caution. Complete daily checklist of the vehicle (brakes, lights, tires, fuel, engine oil, etc.). Maintain cleanliness and regular servicing of the vehicle. Maintain records related to fuel usage and mileage. Immediately inform the authorities about any accidents or mechanical issues. Be prepared to take on additional responsibilities or work on different routes in case of emergencies. Maintain respectful, professional, and responsible behavior with passengers.

Requirements: Valid driving license (professional license preferred). Must have at least 3 (three) years of practical experience in driving manual vehicles. Special experience in driving Hiace or similar microbuses preferred. Should have a good understanding of road safety and traffic laws. Must have integrity, punctuality, and a responsible mindset. Should have a mindset to work overtime or extra hours as needed.

The General Manager will be responsible for the overall management, operational control, compliance, financial oversight, and business growth of the companyтАЩs three mobile retail shops dealing with imported mobile phone sets. The role requires strong leadership, integrity, discipline, and experience in administration and governance.

ЁЯЫД Key Roles & Responsibilities
тЬЕ Business Growth & Planning
- Develop detailed strategies, action plans, and timelines to increase the companyтАЩs products and services and expand business operations.
- Identify opportunities for business improvement, operational efficiency, and sustainable growth.

тЬЕ Operations & Team Management
- Oversee daily operations of all three mobile shops and ensure smooth workflow.
- Lead, manage, and supervise shop managers and staff, ensuring discipline, coordination, and performance improvement.
- Conduct regular shop visits and performance evaluations.

тЬЕ Customer Care & Service Excellence
- Ensure high-quality customer care services across all outlets.
- Maintain strong relationships with customers and resolve major complaints or disputes professionally.

тЬЕ Inventory & Asset Control
- Monitor inward and outward movement of mobile phones and accessories.
- Ensure proper documentation, IMEI records, stock registers, and prevention of stock loss or misuse.
- Verify inventory reports and ensure transparency in stock management.

тЬЕ Financial Oversight & Confidentiality
- Oversee all financial transactions of the company, including sales, expenses, cash handling, and bank deposits.
- Supervise loan disbursement and recovery (if applicable) in accordance with company policies.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of all financial transactions, records, and sensitive company information.

тЬЕ Compliance & Governance
- Ensure compliance with government regulations, customs documentation, VAT, tax, and company policies.
- Maintain proper records to support audits, inspections, and regulatory requirements.

тЬЕ Staff & Customer Welfare
- Ensure customers and office staff receive all benefits, facilities, and entitlements as per company rules and policies.
- Promote ethical practices, fairness, and professionalism within the organization.

тЬЕ Reporting & Coordination
- Prepare and submit regular operational and financial reports to ownership/management.
- Coordinate closely with accounts, operations, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
- Report risks, irregularities, or operational issues promptly with recommendations for corrective action.

Preferred Candidate Profile
Age: 25-65 years
Background: Retired Army / Defense / Banker / College or University Teacher / Government Service
Strong leadership, integrity, administrative experience, and decision-making ability

Requirements: тЬЕ Required Documents Updated CV / Resume Recent passport-size photograph Photocopies of educational certificates Photocopy of National ID (NID) тЬЕ Required Qualifications & Skills Masters or equivalen

Responsibilities: Responsibilities of a CCTV Technician:

Setting up CCTV systems, including cameras, wiring, and recording devices, as well as configuring software and network connections.

Regularly inspecting and testing CCTV equipment to ensure optimal performance and identifying potential issues before they escalate.

Diagnosing and repairing faults in CCTV systems, including camera malfunctions, wiring problems, and software errors.

Project Maintenance Works.

- Troubleshooting & Repair: Diagnose, repair, or replace broken components (cameras, cabling, power supplies, NVRs/DVRs).
- Documentation: Maintain accurate service logs, system configurations, and maintenance reports.

Interacting with clients to address their concerns, provide support, and explain the operation of the system.

Provide technical support to users, troubleshoot issues, and ensure the smooth and secure operation of IT infrastructure. IT Technicians are essential for maintaining an organization's technological capabilities and productivity. Configuring, monitoring, and maintaining LAN/WAN networks, ensuring network security and connectivity.

- Experience: Proven experience as a CCTV Technician, with 2-3 years preferred.

Ability to work at heights and in various weather conditions. Ability to UTP /Fiber Cable laying.

Responsibilities: We are looking for a creative and detail-oriented Video Editor & Motion Designer to join our team. The selected candidate will be responsible for editing videos, creating motion graphics, and producing engaging visual content for digital platforms, marketing campaigns, and promotional materials.

Job Responsibilities:

- Edit raw footage into compelling, polished videos for social media, websites, and promotional materials
- Follow scripts, outlines, or storyboards to arrange footage in a logical sequence
- Apply transitions, effects, motion graphics, titles, and captions
- Add music, voice-overs, and sound effects for balanced audio
- Perform trimming, cropping, resizing, color grading, stabilization, and rendering
- Ensure all video content follows brand guidelines and quality standards
- Collaborate with marketing and creative teams
- Check videos for errors and technical issues before final delivery
- Stay updated with the latest video editing trends and technologies

Requirements: Additional Requirements

- Age 20 to 35 years
- Proven experience in video editing
- Proficiency in: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci
- Resolve excellent storytelling and visual sense
- Strong organizational and time management skills
- Ability to work independently and in a team
- Creative mindset with a passion for video production
- Marketing-related experience will be an advantage

Responsibilities: Core Responsibilities
- Handle day-to-day accounting (cash, bank, petty cash, journals)
- Prepare event-wise budgets and track actual vs planned cost
- Manage vendor bills, advances, and final settlements
- Issue client invoices and follow up for payments (this is critical)
- Maintain receivables & payables reports

Event-Specific Duties
- Control event-wise expense tracking (fabrication, manpower, logistics, F&B, artists, etc.)
- Verify vendor quotations, PO, and bills before payment
- Ensure on-site cash disbursement is documented properly

Financial Control & Compliance
- Maintain VAT, Tax, TDS records
- Assist in monthly closing & audit support
- Ensure company policies are followed in spending
- Maintain proper bill files & digital records

Coordination & Reporting
- Coordinate with Project Managers & Operations team
- Prepare profit/loss reports per event
- Submit management financial reports
- Support decision-making with cost insights

Tools & Skills Expected
- Strong in Excel / Google Sheets
- Knowledge of Tally / accounting software
- Good understanding of event costing
- Detail-oriented, deadline-driven mindset

- Knowledge of VAT, Tax & compliance (practical, not textbook)
- Experience handling vendor bills, payments & client invoicing
- Strong attention to detail and accuracy
- Ability to work under tight deadlines & pressure (events donтАЩt wait)
- Good communication & coordination skills
- Honest, organized, and responsible mindset

Optional (Adds Extra Value)
- Experience in event management / advertising agency
- Knowledge of petty cash & on-site cash handling
- Understanding of budget control & P/L reporting

- Visit assigned outlets (A-category retail, supermarkets, and stores) daily to achieve sales targets.
- Build and maintain relationships with retailers and distributors.
- Ensure product visibility and availability in the market.
- Collect payments from credit sales within 2-3 days.
- Report daily sales, collections, and competitor activities to management.

- Previous experience in FMCG sales (especially snacks/chanachur/biscuits/tea/soft drinks) is an advantage.
- Age: 20-30 years.
- Must be hardworking, target-oriented, and self-motivated.
- Good communication skills in Bangla (basic English is a plus).
- Should live near target sales areas (Gulshan, Banani, Baridhara, Mohakhali DOHS, Badda, Rampura, Niketan).

Salary & Benefits:
- Salary (Basic, sales incentive, and others): 15,000 BDT per month.
- Sales Incentives & Bonus based on performance.
- Mobile bill and travel allowance (as per company policy).
- Weekly holiday: Friday.

Responsibilities: Purpose: Ensure refrigerators meet quality standards by inspecting components, monitoring production processes, and identifying defects before shipment. Key Responsibilities: - Inspect incoming materials, in-process units, and finished refrigerators.
- Perform functional, dimensional, and visual quality checks per SOP.
- Record inspection data and prepare quality reports.
- Identify and report defects, non-conformities, and process deviations.
- Ensure compliance with safety, quality, and ISO standards.
- Coordinate with production teams to resolve quality issues. Requirements: - SSC/HSC or Diploma in Engineering (preferred).
- Fresher/ 1тАУ2 yearsтАЩ experience in quality control (home appliances/manufacturing preferred).
- Knowledge of inspection tools, measuring devices, and SOPs.
- Attention to detail, communication, and teamwork skills. KPIs: - Defect rate reduction.
- On-time inspection completion.
- Compliance with quality and safety standards.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. Each year, millions of tourists visit the islands, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular salaries, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Private villa and condominium construction Position: Electrician Number of positions: 8 Responsibilities: Installation of electrical lines on building and construction sites Installation of switches, sockets, DB boards, and light fittings Diagnosis and repair of electrical faults Adherence to safety standards Requirements: Age: 21-40 years Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates in the mentioned field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and adaptable, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy relies heavily on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular pay, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Position: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Plumber Number of Positions: 7 Job Responsibilities: Installation of water pipes, drainage, and sanitary lines Working on bathroom and kitchen fittings Fixing pipe leaks and blockage issues Repair work on new and old lines Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in the relevant job; training and experience certificates in the field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant job is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and tolerant, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 per month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Comparatively low visa processing costs Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on conditions Deadline for File Submission: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

Responsibilities: ```html Job Summary: The main responsibility of this position will be to communicate with interested students/clients of Skillroom Bangladesh IT regarding online courses and digital services, provide them with accurate information according to their needs, and assist in the enrollment process. It is an Ed-Tech position rich in opportunities for freshers to learn. job_title: ржорзНржпрж╛рж╕ржи ржлрзЛрж░ржорзНржпрж╛ржи-China State Middle East-рж╕рзМржжрж┐ ржЖрж░ржм
job_description:
Responsibilities: China State Middle East, a renowned organization in Saudi Arabia, is hiring skilled and experienced Mason Foreman.

Responsibilities:
- Supervising and dividing work among the mason team.
- Overseeing all masonry work including blocks, plaster, tiles, and brickwork.
- Ensuring work is done correctly according to project drawings.
- Preparing daily progress reports and informing the supervisor/engineer.
- Ensuring site safety rules are followed and providing guidance on risk prevention.

Benefits:
- Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + food + accommodation + OT
- Accommodation and food provided by the company
- Working hours: 10 hours per day
- Other benefits: Company will provide visa and transportation
- Overtime: As per Saudi labor law

Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying)
========================================
- Educational Qualification: Diploma/B.Sc in Civil Engineering.
- Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training.
- Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/foreign work experience will be preferred.
- Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic.

ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March 2026 (Dhaka)

Additional Information:
- Visa contract period: 2 years - renewable
- Passport: All applicants must bring both new and old passports to the interview. Passports must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Applicants without passports should not apply.
- Payment terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa.

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The nation consists of three neighboring islands located in the middle of the Leeward Islands - Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. The islands attract millions of tourists each year, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular wages, a good working environment, and affordable cost of living for foreign workers. Field: Private villa and condominium construction Position: Mason Number of positions: 10 Job Responsibilities: Construction of walls using brick, block, and concrete Cement mixing and work according to the level Structure creation according to the plan Coordinate work with the team on the construction site Requirements: Age: 21-40 years. Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently. Candidates must submit a video demonstrating their skills in their respective field; training and experience certificates related to the job must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in the relevant field is necessary. Candidates must be mentally calm and tolerant, and must be able to adapt to the local culture. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 / month; 6 days a week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Visa processing costs are comparatively low Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on performance. Deadline for submitting files: First week of March, 2026 Delegate Interview: March, 2026

job_description:
Responsibilities: A skilled and experienced Steel Fixer Foreman is being recruited for the renowned organization China State Middle East in Saudi Arabia. Responsibilities: Supervise and coordinate all steel fixing related tasks Provide guidance and direction to the team on site Ensure work is carried out as per project drawings and specifications Prepare daily activity reports and update management Manage work following safety standards and company regulations Benefits: Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + Accommodation + Food + OT Accommodation and Food: Provided by the company Working Hours: 10 hours per day Other Benefits: Company will provide visa and transportation Overtime: As per Saudi labor law ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Educational Qualification: Diploma/ B.Sc in Civil Engineering Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certifications or training Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/ overseas work experience will be preferred Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Period: 2 years - Renewable Passport: All applicants must bring both new and old passports to the interview. Passport must be valid for at least 1.5 years. Applicants without a passport should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa

job_description:
Responsibilities: A skilled and experienced Civil General Foreman is being recruited for the renowned organization China State Middle East in Saudi Arabia. Responsibilities: Supervising and managing all civil works (earth cutting, concrete, blocks, plaster, formwork, steel fixing). Coordinating the work of various teams on-site and ensuring proper distribution of work. Ensuring that daily work is progressing correctly according to drawings, specifications, and BOQ. Preparing daily reports based on work progress and providing them to engineers/site managers. Ensuring site safety protocols and company policies. Managing equipment - material requisition, usage, and proper storage. Making quick decisions to solve problems and maintain work progress. Benefits: Salary: 2500 - 4000 Saudi Riyal + Food + Accommodation + OT Accommodation and Food: Provided by the company Working Hours: 10 hours per day Other Benefits: Company will provide transportation and insurance Overtime: As per Saudi labor law ЁЯУМ Qualifications: (Please read the details carefully before applying for the job) ======================================== Educational Qualification: Diploma/ B.Sc in Civil Engineering Certification: Preference will be given to candidates with relevant professional certificates or training. Experience: 3 to 5 years of work experience. Candidates with GCC/foreign work experience will be preferred. Language: Must be able to speak basic English or Arabic. ЁЯУЖ Delegate Interview: March, 2026 (Dhaka) Additional Information: Visa Contract Period: 2 years - Renewable Passport: All candidates must bring both new and old passports for the interview. The passport must have a minimum validity of 1.5 years. Candidates without a passport should not apply. Payment Terms: Payment will be made after obtaining the visa

job_description:
Responsibilities: Summary: Pubali Bank PLC is hiring skilled and proactive individuals for the expansion of Pi Banking services. Selected candidates will be involved in the activation of merchant registration and QR services at the bank. Location: Candidates will work in their respective areas (opportunity to work locally). Responsibilities: 1. Assist customers in opening savings and current accounts. 2. Verify KYC (Know Your Customer) documents such as trade license, national ID, photos, and application forms as per Bangladesh Bank's guidelines. 3. Provide other account-related services (ATM card, checkbook, mobile banking). 4. Enter complete information into the system including address, bank account, and transaction profiles. 5. Capture and upload photos of merchants. 6. Ensure necessary signatures on contracts with merchants. 7. Deposit documents at the relevant branch and complete the QR code issuance process. Qualifications and Skills: тШЕ Must have knowledge of using smartphones and the internet. тШЕ Should have a mindset for marketing work. тШЕ Must be skilled in communication and confident. тШЕ Should have an understanding of local shops and business establishments. Target and Salary: Minimum of 60 merchant accounts If the target is achieved, the monthly salary will be рз│16,000. Special Benefits: Incentive/commission based on target achievement Possibility of permanent employment based on good performance. Note: No financial transactions are involved in the position of QR Executive Officer.
